page.title: 06QUADRANT SHOPS:ST.ALBANS
page.content: The Quadrant is a popular shopping area.There are 3 hairdressers, 2 banks, 2 butchers, 2 chemists, 2 greengrocers, 2 hardware shops; a post office, optician, travel agent, estate agent, off-licence, jewellers, dry cleaners, children's wear, bakery, menswear, launderette, beauty parlour, shoe repairers and newsagents. There are also fish, book, carpet, toy, record, furniture,wool, gift and car accessory shops. There are 2 supermarkets and 1 empty shop. {Survey of 97 people.}72 out of 97 said that the facilities are adaquate.49 people use it as their main shopping area. Most people use it because it is convenient and has easy parking.} Shops/Supermarket are planned for { {Jersey Farm.}76 people approved but there are still planning problems.
